item.title: Certified Google My Business Provider
item.description:
I became a Google My Business Trusted Verifier back in 2018. Since that time, I have verified many businesses, mainly in Africa. Because in Europe businesses can easily use the Google Postcard validation to claim/verify their Google My Business listing, but in most African countries there is no regular mail delivery system in place.

Read more:

  • “ Google My Business Trusted Verifier for Africa!” (2018-09-18)
  • “ Google My Business Provider for Africa” (2020-01-31)
  • “ About My Business Provider” (source: Google)
